title: Devbox Plugin Schema
description: Defines fields and values for public devbox plugins

$schema.description: The schema version of this plugin file.

description.description: A short description of the plugin and how it works. This will automatically display when the user first installs the plugin, or runs `devbox info`

items.description: Name and version of each package in name@version format.

oneOf.description: Name of each package in {"name": {"version": "1.2.3"}} format.
Version number of the specified package in {"version": "1.2.3"} format.

platforms.description: Names of platforms to install the package on. This package will be skipped for any platforms not on this list

excluded_platforms.description: Names of platforms to exclude the package on

glibc_patch.description: Whether to patch glibc to the latest available version for this package

oneOf.description: Version of the package to install.

env.description: List of additional environment variables to be set in the Devbox environment. These can be overridden by environment variables set in the user's devbox.json

create_files.description: List of files to create in the user's project directory when the plugin is activated. The key points to the file path where the file will be created. The value points to the default file that should be copied to that location

shell.description: Shell specific options and hooks for the plugin.

init_hook.description: Shell command to run right before initializing the user's shell, running a script, or starting a service

scripts.description: List of command/script definitions to run with `devbox run <script_name>`.

include.description: List of additional plugins to activate within your devbox shell

items.description: Name of the plugin to activate.
